story_teamflare_01_03000/2401_1001_0200_:
During Champion Diantha’s play, people calling
themselves Team Flare burst onto the stage.
story_teamflare_01_03000/2401_1001_0400_:
They engaged Diantha in battle in an attempt
to take over the stage, but they were all
taken out...
story_teamflare_01_03000/2401_1001_0700_: If there’s any more movement, please contact me.
